config.shieldbreak.server.damageMinimumT: Minimum amount of damage any shield will withstand before chance of cooldown.
config.shieldbreak.server.damageMaximumT:
Damage Maximum Threshold
config.shieldbreak.server.damageMaximumThreshold.tooltip=Scaling for how much damage a shield will withstand before chance of cooldown based on max durability. (Durability/This = Damage)
config.shieldbreak.server.damageDurabili:
Damage Durability Scaling
config.shieldbreak.server.damageDurabilityScaling.tooltip=Scaling for how much damage a shield will withstand before chance of cooldown based on max durability. (Durability/This = Damage)
config.shieldbreak.server.cooldownTicksM: Minimum amount of cooldown ticks a shield break will cause.
Maximum amount of cooldown ticks a shield break will cause.
config.shieldbreak.server.cooldownTicksS: Multiplier for cooldown ticks per point of damage.
config.shieldbreak.server.parryTickRange: Range for how long the shield can be held up and still parry the attack. (Counted after the initial shield delay, if any)
config.shieldbreak.server.unbreakableShi: How much durability a shield should have for the purpose of scaling if it's max durability is 0.
config.shieldbreak.server.shieldRaiseTic: How many ticks should it take when raising a shield for it to become active.
config.shieldbreak.server.shieldBypassCh: Base chance for a weapon that can break shields to ignore shield protection and cause a cooldown. (Ex. Axe and Halberd)
config.shieldbreak.server.shieldBypassCo: How long should the cooldown be if a weapon that can break shields bypasses the shield. (Ex. Axe and Halberd)
config.shieldbreak.server.alwaysResetAct: Always reset active hand after shield hit? (Fixes exploit with using handheld gui's to attack while shielding)
config.shieldbreak.server.potionEffectAt: Potion Effects to apply to an attacker on a parry. (Potion,Duration,Amplifier)
config.shieldbreak.server.potionEffectDe: Potion Effects to apply to a defender on a parry. (Potion,Duration,Amplifier)
config.shieldbreak.server.potionEffectAt: Potion Effects to apply to an attacker on a break. (Potion,Duration,Amplifier)
config.shieldbreak.server.potionEffectDe: Potion Effects to apply to a defender on a break. (Potion,Duration,Amplifier)
